title: Cant start a game stuck on Recconect screen
body: Hi, I just finished my game and for some reason my game have glitched out where instead of allowing me to start a new game I am just stuck on a "reconnect" screen of my client even through I am not actually in a game.

replies.body: Hey we're looking into this now.  Hang tight and the server will pick up that the match has ended.  This is being looked into now, and I'll offer more info as it comes.
Porocles, good sir, I've been waiting for hours and it's still not changing. I'm not sure if anyone else is struggling but I'm kinda losing my cool pretty fast (I want to play some League...)

Post game lobby took longer then usual so I hit the skip waiting for stats button,  my screen then went black.  Now it seems everytime I log back in my client will create a new game and try make me join it.  After closing it my client will open back up with a reconnect button.  If i check the timer under my name is shows that I had just created a new game.

Hope any of this helps, it's my day off :/
Same problem here, and I really hope this issues would be figured out as soon as possible.
